Help us to raise more for charity, by growing our marketplace of NFTs

Send us your NFTs, or let us design a set for you.

  • Join our Telegram Chat & tell us about your project. Choose from our options:
  • Send us a set of NFTs in a square format over 300px.
  • Or let our external artist design a set of NFTs for you.
  • The more NFTs you want to upload, the more you donate to charity.
  • Then we upload it to our market place.
